nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_399
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Not only can students choose when and where to learn for an online course, but they can also take time to think through answers before making a reply.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_400
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: She is excited by the idea of online learning while he considers it meaningless and useless.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_401
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Communicating with native English speakers is a very rewarding experience from which we can learn a lot.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_402
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Today, more and more people have access to the Internet through which they look for the information they need.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_403
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: He wants her to give up working and stay home to look after the children. She feels, however, that this is too much for her.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_404
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Now that we have finished the course, we shall start doing more revision work.
